#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>

int main()
{
	char str[40][80] = { 0 };
	int a = 0, i, j;

	while (1)
	{
		char foo[200] = { 0 };
		gets(foo);

		i = 0;

		while (i < 36)
		{
			str[i++][a] = '|';
		}

		if (foo[0] == '#')
			break;

		a++;
		i = 0;

		while (i < 36)
		{
			if (foo[i] == '\0')
				str[i][a] = ' ';
			else
				str[i][a] = foo[i];
			i++;
		}

		a++;
	}

	a++;

	for (i = 0; i < a; i++)
		printf("-");
	printf("\n");

	for (i = 0; i < 36; i++)
	{
		for (j = 0; j < a; j++)
			printf("%c", str[i][j]);
		printf("\n");
	}

	for (i = 0; i < a; i++)
		printf("-");
	printf("\n");

	return 0;
}
